name.japanese: 人間オークション会場

description: A large auction house on Sabaody Archipelago where humans, merfolk, and other beings are sold as slaves. The auction house is protected by the World Government and frequented by Celestial Dragons.

keyEvents.title: Three Captains vs. Marines Battle
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Law, and Kid emerge from the Human Auctioning House to face the Marines who have surrounded the building. The three Supernova crews join forces to break through the encirclement.
keyEvents.significance: The area outside the auction house becomes a battlefield where the three Supernova captains demonstrate their powers and establish their rivalry.

keyEvents.title: Jean Bart Freed at Auction House
keyEvents.description: Jean Bart, who was being kept as a slave by Saint Rosward, is freed by Trafalgar Law outside the auction house after the chaos inside.
keyEvents.significance: The auction house serves as the location where Jean Bart gains his freedom and joins the Heart Pirates.

statusHistory.reason: Operating as a slave auction house

name.japanese: シャッキーのぼったくりBAR

description: A bar on Sabaody Archipelago owned by Shakuyaku (Shakky), where Silvers Rayleigh often stays. It serves as a safe haven and information hub.

keyEvents.title: Rayleigh Reveals Roger's History
keyEvents.description: At Shakky's bar, Rayleigh tells the Straw Hats about his time as Roger's vice-captain and reveals the truth about Roger's capture and terminal illness.
keyEvents.significance: The bar serves as the setting for major revelations about the Pirate King's history, making it an important location for world-building.

statusHistory.reason: Operating as a bar and information hub
